definitions.definition: A person who does not eat, drink or otherwise consume any animal products

A person committed to avoiding products and practices that inherently involve animal use, including all foods containing animal products, and to abstaining from direct and intentional harm to animals as far as possible; an adherent to veganism.
definitions.example: Our vegan-friendly shaving brush is made with synthetic bristles instead of badger hair.

definitions.definition: (of a product or practice, especially food) Not containing animal products (meat, eggs, milk, leather, etc) or inherently involving animal use.
definitions.example: He eats a completely vegan diet.

definitions.definition: (of a person) Committed to avoiding any product or practice that inherently involves animal use.
definitions.example: She is not vegan as she eats eggs and wears leather.
She is interested in vegan philosophy.
